introduction.title: Welcome to Delicious Bites
introduction.content: At Delicious Bites, we believe that great food brings people together. Our passion for culinary excellence drives us to create memorable dining experiences using the finest ingredients and time-honored recipes. Whether you're joining us for a casual lunch, romantic dinner, or special celebration, we're committed to serving you exceptional food in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
introduction.highlight1: Signature recipes standardized for every branch.
introduction.highlight2: Fresh, local sourcing with seasonal rotations.
introduction.highlight3: Guest-first hospitality training for every team.

brand.title: Our Story
brand.subtitle: Founded in 2015, Delicious Bites has been serving the community with authentic flavors and exceptional hospitality for over 8 years.
brand.journeyContent1: What started as a small family restaurant has grown into a beloved dining destination. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has remained unchanged throughout our journey.
brand.journeyContent2: We take pride in creating dishes that not only taste amazing but also tell a story of tradition, creativity, and the love we have for food.

chefs.title: Expert Chefs
chefs.description: Our experienced chefs bring passion and creativity to every dish

love.title: Made with Love
love.description: Every meal is prepared with care and attention to detail

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: We use only the finest ingredients sourced from trusted suppliers
